channel.title: Need help with coding on Source
channel.description:
Hello. I have a problem, -I dont know how to change the text of a NPC's talking. (the text showing over NPC's head)
Ive opened 'NPCHandler.java' then ive scrolled down and changed this text. (Look at picture 1.)[img]http://Namnls.jpg[/img]
Ive restarted server then nothing changed ( Look at picture 2.)[img]http://Namnlsas.jpg[/img]
Please help me with this, i would really really apriciate it.
------- Compile problems;
Cant compile server. This is the text i recive; 'You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Press any key to continue...'
This is the site that get opens; 'http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp' I have downloaded the latest verson, BUT The compiler is still the same. I really apriciate any help i can get.
----- ANOTHER PROBLEM! NOTE NOTE NOTE!----
Now when i've downloaded java sun, latest verson, The Client Silabsoft aint working; It load to 100% then send me to; 'http://client.silabsoft.org/loaderror_download%20client.html'
- Maybe i should go back to RuneScape? :confused: :o :eek: :eek:
Thank You.

item.title: Need help with coding on Source
item.dc:creator: @gurkoworks gurkoworks
item.description:
@gurkoworks wrote:

Hello.
I have a problem,
-I dont know how to change the text of a NPC’s talking. (the text showing over NPC’s head)

Ive opened ‘NPCHandler.java’ then ive scrolled down and changed this text. (Look at picture 1.)

Ive restarted server then nothing changed ( Look at picture 2.)

Please help me with this, i would really really apriciate it.

Compile problems;

Cant compile server. This is the text i recive; ‘You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. Finished! Press any key to continue…’

This is the site that get opens; ‘http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp’ I have downloaded the latest verson, BUT The compiler is still the same. I really apriciate any help i can get.

----- ANOTHER PROBLEM! NOTE NOTE NOTE!----

Now when i’ve downloaded java sun, latest verson, The Client Silabsoft aint working; It load to 100% then send me to; ‘http://client.silabsoft.org/loaderror_download%20client.html’

  • Maybe i should go back to RuneScape? :o :eek: :eek:

Thank You.
